cause.description:
World Vision is present where human needs are greatest — and where hearts can be moved to help the poor. Each year we build on our effective work from the past, with the vision of helping every child experience life in all its fullness.
In nearly 100 countries around the globe, World Vision joins with local people to find lasting ways to improve the lives of children and families in poverty.
Check out their web site to see how you can get involved and to see all the work that they do!
www.worldvision.org
1. Spread the Christian message worldwide.
2. Aid children in poverty.
3. Prevent worldly injustices on impoverished families.
cause.mission: Our mission is to glorify Christ by working with children, families and their communities worldwide to reach their full potential by tackling causes of poverty and injustice.
cause.name: World Vision International
